member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.ColumnNameEmptyOnIndex(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Found a column on index {indexName} on table {tableName} with an empty or null name. Not including column in index.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.FoundColumn(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Found column on table: {tableName}, column name: {columnName}, data type: {dataType}, ordinal: {ordinal}, not nullable: {isNotNullable}, primary key ordinal: {primaryKeyOrdinal}, default value: {defaultValue}.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.FoundForeignKeyColumn(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Found foreign key column on table: {tableName}, id: {id}, principal table: {principalTableName}, column name: {columnName}, principal column name: {principalColumnName}, delete action: {deleteAction}, ordinal: {ordinal}.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.FoundIndex(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Found index with name: {indexName}, table: {tableName}, is unique: {isUnique}.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.FoundIndexColumn(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Found index column on index {indexName} on table {tableName}, column name: {columnName}, ordinal: {ordinal}.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.FoundTable(System.Object)
member.summary: Found table with name: {name}.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.PrincipalColumnNotFound(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: For foreign key with identity {id} on table {tableName}, unable to find the column called {principalColumnName} on the foreign key's principal table, {principalTableName}. Skipping foreign key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.PrincipalTableNotFound(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: For foreign key with identity {id} on table {tableName}, unable to find the principal table {principalTableName}. Either the principal table is missing from the database or it was not included in the selection set. Skipping foreign key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.TableNotInSelectionSet(System.Object)
member.summary: Table {tableName} is not included in the selection set. Skipping.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqliteDesignStrings.UsingSchemaSelectionsWarning
member.summary: Scaffolding from a SQLite database will ignore any schema selection arguments.
